segments.text: The kitchen drawing shows a typical home moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman dries a plate by the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling up and starting to overflow slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are open above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A cookie jar sits inside, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses a stool to reach it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while grabbing a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby extends her hand toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back to let in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of daily life.
segments.speaker: PAR
